title: Competency Development Course on Library Automation Systems and E-Book Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic library usage experience and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Targeting job-seeking students requiring efficient research data retrieval in science fields and learning management tool utilization.

learning_goals: Learners retrieve required academic resources within 10 minutes using a library automation system.
Learners systematically organize and utilize specialized scientific literature through an e-book platform.
Based on field observations, learners can propose three or more ideas for improving library services.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
